content: simple cat toy supplies worsted weight yarn i used lion brand fisherman s wool in brown there is lots of discussion on cats being able to smell acrylic or not like the smell of acrylic - so i used all wool 4 - size 5 dpns or your method of choice for knit in the round polyfill stuffing dried catnip tapestry needle instructions leaving a 10 tail - cast on 22 distribute evenly on three dpns or your favorite in the round method of choice row 1-16 - joining to knit in the round knit all row approx 2 5 row 17 - k1 bobble in next stitch knit 4 bobble in next stitch row 18-19 - knit be sure to pull stitches at bobble tight row 20 - k1 k2tog - repeat to the end row 21-22 - knit row 23 - k2tog - repeat to the end cut yarn leaving 10 thread tail through needle and draw remaining stitches through tail yarn and pull tightly closed use cast on tail yarn to slip_stitch around cast on edge see photo i use the front loop of the cast on this make the neatest closed end fill with stuffing and catnip if desired if using catnip layer stuffing catnip stuffing catnip stuffing starting and ending with stuffing tail thread needle with three 12 strands of yarn stich bottom end and pull through only three strands see photo tie simple knot and then braid 6 strands see photo knot at desired length and cut ½ from knot bobble stitch there are good videos on this in youtube k1 p1 k1 p1 in next stitch turn purl 4 turn knit 4 turn purl 4 turn slip 2 sts k2tog pass slipped stitches over photos on next page- to save ink don t print page 2
